K12D0557_H0515:501a-11: mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do
K12D0557_H0515:501a-12: // phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems

K12D0557_H0515:501a-16: su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do
K12D0557_H0515:501a-17: // rgyal ba'i sku mdog btso ma'i gser 'dra ste //

K12D0557_H0515:501a-19: gser gyi ri dbang lta bu'i gser gyi mdog /
K12D0557_H0515:501a-20: thub pa padma dkar po gser mdog can //
K12D0557_H0515:501a-21: bzang po'i mtshan gyis sku lus rab tu brgyan //
K12D0557_H0515:501a-22: dpe byad sna tshogs bzang pos sku lus spras //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-0: gser gyi @501b 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-1: shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-2: tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-3: seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs [?]/
K12D0557_H0515:501b-4: yan lag drug cu bsgrags sgra dri med sgra //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-5: rgyal dbyangs rma bya ka la ping ka'i sgra //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-6: shin tu dri med dri bral gzi 'od mdzes //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-7: rgyal ba bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri bral mchog /
K12D0557_H0515:501b-8: rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-9: sems can rnams la phan pa thugs brtse mchog /
K12D0557_H0515:501b-10: 'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog /
K12D0557_H0515:501b-11: rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-12: mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-13: 'chi ba med pa'i bde ba stsol ba ste //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-14: rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston; ;'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-15: bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-16: rgyal bas 'gro ba sdug bsngal thar bar mdzod //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-17: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-18: zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-19: skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol ba //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-20: khyod la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-21: de snyed 'dren pa'i yon tan ye shes mtsho //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-22: srog chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-23: byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang //
K12D0557_H0515:501b-24: khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-0: @502a *// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-1: yon tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-2: lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-3: yon tan mtsho las yon tan thigs blangs te //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-4: de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-5: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-6: sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog /
K12D0557_H0515:502a-7: gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las /
K12D0557_H0515:502a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu dgu pa'o ////
K12D0557_H0515:502a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan
K12D0557_H0515:502a-10: las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
K12D0557_H0515:502a-11: nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
K12D0557_H0515:502a-12: te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
K12D0557_H0515:502a-13: thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa
K12D0557_H0515:502a-14: 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod
K12D0557_H0515:502a-15: do // thub dbang khyod ni bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-16: dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-17: kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhi ba ston //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-18: nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam par 'phro //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-19: 'od zer du ma 'bar bas 'od kyis khyab //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-20: kha dog sna tshogs dang bas rin chen 'dra //
K12D0557_H0515:502a-21: sngon po dkar po gser 'od bee d'urya //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-0: zangs dang skya rengs shel gyi @502b 'od lta bus //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-1: rdo rje ri dbang ri rab thal mdzad cing //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-2: zhing rnams bye ba du mar snang mdzad de //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-3: sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po zhi bar mdzad //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-4: bde ba mchog gis sems can tshim par mdzad //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-5: mdog dang dbang po gsal bag blta na mdzes //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-6: gzugs bltas mi ngoms spyi bos blta na dga'//
K12D0557_H0515:502b-7: rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-8: bung ba mang pos gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-9: thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis brgyan //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-10: ting 'dzin byams pa bsod nams dam pa bsags //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-11: dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-12: ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan brgyan //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-13: khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa mdzad //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-14: bde mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-15: yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-16: zhing rnams bye ba dag tu lhang nge ste //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-17: me yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-18: ji ltar nam mkhar nyi dkyil rdzogs pa bzhin //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-19: ri rab lta bur yon tan kun ldan par //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-20: 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gda'//
K12D0557_H0515:502b-21: ba zho ku mu da dung zla 'dra zhing //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-22: kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po bzang 'dra ba'i //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-23: tshems kyi phreng bas khyod kyi zhal mdzes pa //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-24: ngang pa'i rgyal po bar snang ji bzhin no //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-25: khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshams nas zla ba 'dra //
K12D0557_H0515:502b-26: g-yas su 'khyil zhing khong chud 'dra ba lags //

K12D0557_H0515:503a-3: gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las /

K12D0557_H0515:503a-14: kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te //

K12D0557_H0515:503a-17: du; ;gang gis mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dra rab

K12D0557_H0515:503a-19: kye ma'o kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje ldan //

K12D0557_H0515:503a-21: zhi ba'i dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs //
K12D0557_H0515:503a-22: ting 'dzin zab cing zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni //
K12D0557_H0515:503b-0: rgyal ba sangs rgyas @503b spyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs //
K12D0557_H0515:503b-1: de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa ste //
K12D0557_H0515:503b-2: rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'ang stong pa lags //

K12D0557_H0515:503b-4: sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal to //

K12D0557_H0515:503b-8: rtag par yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid //
K12D0557_H0515:503b-9: bdag ni rtag tu dog sar pus mo btsugs nas su //

K12D0557_H0515:503b-12: bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong bar rab tu skom //
